name: Bookstore Dream
description:
Ever had a dream of owning your own bookstore? Now you can!

Bookstore Dream is a simulation game that allows you to manage your lovely bookstore.

Get connected with publishers and put the best books on your shelf! Be sure to keep stocks at a good level when demand goes up! If you do everything right you will become a well known brand in the community!

Game Features:

Management is not an easy task, you have to choose what books fit your store the best! Can you handle it?

Create a well-run bookstore and become rich!

Want demand soaring through the roof? Get authors to your store to meet and greet their fans!
